QuestData.Title: Off the Wall!
QuestData.Description:
The yaungol on the wall here are providing covering fire for the ones below. I don't know what Lao-chen is thinking, but I want you to deal with these archers.
The good news is, up here we've got the spirit of the Ox helping us. When they're weakened, the ox spirit will stun them and you can use it to knock 'em off the wall.
You'll find the archers just out that door.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Osul Veteran Archers or Osul Fire-Warriors.
QuestData.RewardText: Ha! I could see them flying. Good work.

Objectives.Objective: Osul Veteran Archers or Fire-Warrior slain
